EnableFeedbackAndSupport.Description: Disable feedback and support uploads from OneDrive client

PreventNetworkTrafficPreUserSignIn.Description: Prevent network traffic before user signs in

RemoveWindowsStore.Description: Keep Store enabled (needed for app updates)

Description: OneDrive: Personal + Business functional with telemetry off. Store: Enabled with upgrade prompts blocked. App auto-updates remain enabled.
